23#include <ctype.h>
24#include "cmap.h"
25
26cmap cmlower(CMAP_BUILTIN);
27cmap cmupper(CMAP_BUILTIN);
28
29#ifdef isascii
30#define ISASCII(c) isascii(c)
31#else
32#define ISASCII(c) (1)
33#endif
34
35cmap::cmap()
36{
37 unsigned char *p = v;
38 for (int i = 0; i <= UCHAR_MAX; i++)
39 p[i] = i;
40}
41
42cmap::cmap(cmap_builtin)
43{
44 // these are initialised by cmap_init::cmap_init()
45}
46
47int cmap_init::initialised = 0;
48
49cmap_init::cmap_init()
50{
51 if (initialised)
52 return;
53 initialised = 1;
54 for (int i = 0; i <= UCHAR_MAX; i++) {
55 cmupper.v[i] = ISASCII(i) && islower(i) ? toupper(i) : i;
56 cmlower.v[i] = ISASCII(i) && isupper(i) ? tolower(i) : i;
57 }
58}
59
